entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
